original: 'di ni len pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni len pa'o //
translated: This is the taking up of it.

original: 'di ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: This is the giving.

original: bdag ni ser sna med pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni ser sna med pa'o //
translated: I am without stinginess.

original: bdag ni sbyin pa'i bdag po'o //
analyzed: bdag ni sbyin pa'i bdag po'o //
translated: I am a lord of giving.

original: bdag ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o //
analyzed: bdag ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o //
translated: I give away all that I have.

original: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o //
translated: I do what the Buddha says.

original: bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o zhes te /🔽sbyin pa de byin nas kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis /🔽sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
analyzed: bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o zhes te / sbyin pa de byin nas kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
translated: I practice the perfection of giving.’

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo zhing bdag gi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dis /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo zhing bdag gi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dis /
translated: Having given that gift, they make it common to all sentient beings and dedicate it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by way of apprehending something.

original: sems can 'di dag tshe 'di nyid la bde ba dang / nye bar len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo ste /🔽de chags pa gsum la chags shing /
analyzed: sems can 'di dag tshe 'di nyid la bde ba dang / nye bar len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo ste / de chags pa gsum la chags shing /
translated: They dedicate it, saying, ‘By the fruit of my giving, may these sentient beings be happy in this very life and pass into complete nirvāṇa without grasping.’

original: sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ste /
translated: They give that gift attached to three attachments.

original: gsum gang zhe na /
analyzed: gsum gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three?

original: de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du @337b shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / sbyin par 'du shes pa 'di gsum la chags nas /
analyzed: de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du @337b shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / sbyin par 'du shes pa 'di gsum la chags nas /
translated: “They give gifts while attached to these three things: the notion of self, the notion of other, and the notion of giving.

original: sbyin pa de dag yongs su gtong ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa de dag yongs su gtong ste /
translated: They give gifts while attached to these three things.

original: 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: This is called the worldly perfection of generosity.

original: 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is it called the worldly perfection of generosity?

original: de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las mi g-yo mi 'phags mi 'da' bas de'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las mi g-yo mi 'phags mi 'da' bas de'i phyir /
translated: Because it does not transcend, rise above, or go beyond the world.

original: 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the worldly perfection of generosity.

original: de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the supramundane perfection of generosity?

original: 'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: It is the purification of the three spheres.

original: de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the purification of the three spheres?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra!

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings give gifts,

original: bdag mi dmigs /
analyzed: bdag mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend a self,

original: len pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: len pa mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend a recipient,

original: sbyin pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: sbyin pa mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend a gift,

original: rnam par smin pa la'ang dga' bar mi byed de /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa la'ang dga' bar mi byed de /
translated: and they do not delight in the ripening of their generosity.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: this is the bodhisattva great beings’ complete purity of the three spheres.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa de sems can thams cad la gtong ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa de sems can thams cad la gtong ste /
translated: furthermore, when bodhisattva great beings give gifts, they give those gifts to all sentient beings,

original: sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo zhing /
analyzed: sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo zhing /
translated: and without apprehending those sentient beings, they dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: mtshan ma cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni /
analyzed: mtshan ma cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni /
translated: They do not see even the slightest sign.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the supramundane perfection of generosity.

original: ci'i @338a *// phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i @338a *// phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is it called the supramundane perfection of generosity?

original: de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g-yo zhing 'phags la /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g-yo zhing 'phags la /
translated: It is because it moves beyond the world, it transcends the world,

original: 'da' bas de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'da' bas de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: it is exalted above the world, and therefore it is called the supramundane perfection of generosity.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽there is also a mundane perfection of morality,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod de /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod de /
translated: and there is also a supramundane perfection of morality.

original: de la 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the mundane perfection of morality?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims bsrung zhing de'ang gnas pas bsrung ste /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims bsrung zhing de'ang gnas pas bsrung ste /
translated: here bodhisattva mahāsattvas practice morality, and they practice it while abiding in a place.

original: de 'di snyam du bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims bsrung ngo //
analyzed: de 'di snyam du bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims bsrung ngo //
translated: They think, “I am observing morality for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: 'di ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: 'di ni tshul khrims so //
translated: This is morality.🔽I am doing what the Buddha said.”

original: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed do zhes de ltar tshul khrims bsrung zhing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
analyzed: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed do zhes de ltar tshul khrims bsrung zhing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
translated: In this way, they observe morality, and by means of apprehending things, they make it common to all sentient beings,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo zhing /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo zhing /
translated: and they dedicate it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bdag gi tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu 'dis /
analyzed: bdag gi tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu 'dis /
translated: “By the fruit of my morality,

original: sems can 'di dag tshe 'di nyid la bde ba dang nye bar len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: sems can 'di dag tshe 'di nyid la bde ba dang nye bar len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: may these sentient beings be happy in this very life, and may they pass into complete nirvāṇa without grasping.”

original: de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / tshul khrims su 'du shes pa dang / chags pa 'di gsum la chags shing tshul khrims bsrung ste /
analyzed: de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / tshul khrims su 'du shes pa dang / chags pa 'di gsum la chags shing tshul khrims bsrung ste /
translated: In this way, they observe morality, attached to these three attachments: the idea of self, the idea of other, and the idea of morality.

original: 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes @338b bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes @338b bya'o //
translated: This is called the perfection of morality of the worldly.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na /

analyzed: de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: It is the purification of the three spheres.

analyzed: de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the purification of the three spheres?

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims bsrung ba'i tshe /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice morality,

analyzed: bdag mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend a self,

analyzed: sems can mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend a sentient being,

analyzed: tshul khrims mi dmigs /

analyzed: de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g-yo zhing 'phag la 'da' bas de'i phyir /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: 'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste /

translated: What is the complete purity of the three spheres?

translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa bsgom pa'i tshe /

analyzed: bdag mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend a self,

original: sems can mi dmigs /
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend a sentient being,

original: bzod pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: bzod pa mi dmigs /

analyzed: de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g-yo zhing 'phags la 'da' bas de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod de /
translated: and there is a perfection of effort that is supramundane.

analyzed: de la 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the perfection of effort that is mundane?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu 'dis sems can 'di dag tshe 'di nyid la bde ba dang / nye bar len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo ste / de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / brtson 'grus su 'du shes pa dang / chags @340a *//
translated: And he dedicates it with the thought, “By the fruit of my effort, may these sentient beings be happy in this very life and attain nirvāṇa without clinging.”

original: pa 'di gsum la chags shing brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
analyzed: pa 'di gsum la chags shing brtson 'grus rtsom mo //

analyzed: de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na /

translated: What is the complete purity of the three spheres?

analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe /

translated: In terms of the way of observing the benefit of self and other, one confesses all evil deeds and rejoices in all merit, and one makes requests to all the buddhas.

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo zhing /

original: de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / shes rab tu 'du shes pa dang / chags pa 'di gsum la chags shing /

analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The perfection of perseverance is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.🔽The perfection of concentration is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: nang stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ni /
translated: inner emptiness

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam @342b mo //🔽phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam @342b mo // phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.🔽Outer emptiness is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //🔽chen po stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo // chen po stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to enlightenment.🔽The emptiness of the great is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to enlightenment.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to enlightenment.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to enlightenment.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to enlightenment.🔽The emptiness of what transcends limits is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to enlightenment.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The emptiness of no beginning and no end is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to enlightenment.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The emptiness of nonrejection is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The emptiness of nature is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The emptiness of specific characteristics is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The emptiness of nonapprehension is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: dngos po @343a *//🔽med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: dngos po @343a *// med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The emptiness of nonthings🔽is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: the four establishments of mindfulness are the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The four right efforts are the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //🔽dbang po lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo // dbang po lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The four legs of magical manifestation are the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.🔽The five faculties are the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: stobs lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: stobs lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The five powers are the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The seven parts of awakening are the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The eightfold noble path is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: the four noble truths are the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: bsam gtan bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The four concentrations are the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: tshad med pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' @343b sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' @343b sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The four immeasurables are the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The four formless absorptions are the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad ni /
translated: The eight deliverances

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: are the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The nine serial absorptions are the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni /
translated: The emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: are the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: mngon par shes pa lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The five superknowledges are the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: All the meditative stabilizations are the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: All the dhāraṇī gateways are the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The ten tathāgata powers are the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The four fearlessnesses are the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //🔽byams pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo // byams pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges are the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.🔽Great love is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam @344a *//
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam @344a *//
translated: Great compassion is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: mo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: mo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.”

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti said, “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: legs so legs so //
analyzed: legs so legs so //
translated: it is excellent, excellent that you have spoken of the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening.

original: de pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi mthu yin /
analyzed: de pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi mthu yin /
translated: What is the power of that perfection?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu ste /
analyzed: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu ste /
translated: it is the power of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad bskyed pa'o //
translated: it is because the perfection of wisdom gives rise to the dharmas of the śrāvakas, the dharmas of the pratyekabuddhas, the dharmas of the bodhisattvas, the dharmas of the buddhas, and all wholesome dharmas.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su sdud cing yang dag par sdud pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su sdud cing yang dag par sdud pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom gathers and truly gathers the dharmas of the śrāvakas, the dharmas of the pratyekabuddhas, the dharmas of the bodhisattvas, the dharmas of the buddhas, and all wholesome dharmas.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /
analyzed: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /
translated: the tathāgatas, arhats, and perfectly awakened buddhas of the past

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad de /
translated: Practicing this perfection of wisdom,🔽

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so //
translated: They have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment by training in this transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di @344b nyid la spyod cing /
analyzed: ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di @344b nyid la spyod cing /
translated: the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas of the future

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: will also attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment by training in this very transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
translated: in the world systems of the ten directions

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig /
translated: all the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas

original: bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang /
analyzed: bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang /
translated: who are present, who are alive, and who are maintaining the spiritual way

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad de /
translated: have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment by training in this very transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so //
translated: and they have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood with respect to unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa'i tshe /
translated: if, when the transcendent perfection of wisdom is being explained,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nem nur ram /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nem nur ram /
translated: the minds of great bodhisattva beings are neither cowed,🔽nor timid,

original: rmongs par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: rmongs par mi 'gyur na /
translated: nor fearful,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir /
translated: it should be known that great bodhisattva beings who are endowed with such attributes, indications, and signs are irreversible.

original: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod pa 'dis /
analyzed: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod pa 'dis /
translated: Through this practice, which is devoid of apprehending anything,

original: rnam par spyod par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par spyod par shes par bya'o //
translated: they should practice.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Great bodhisattva beings who are endowed with such attributes, indications, and signs

original: snying rje chen po yid la bya ba'i yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yid la bya ba'i yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o //
translated: should be known to be irreversible.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: One should know that mental activity is isolated because the perfection of perseverance is isolated.🔽One should know that mental activity is non-arising because the perfection of perseverance is non-arising.🔽One should know that mental activity is non-ceasing because the perfection of perseverance is non-ceasing.

original: yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir /
translated: One should know that mental activity is pure because the perfection of perseverance is pure.🔽One should know that mental activity is not something that can be appropriated because the perfection of perseverance is not something that can be appropriated.🔽One should know that mental activity is non-existent because the perfection of perseverance is non-existent.🔽One should know that mental activity is unproduced because the perfection of perseverance is unproduced.🔽One should know that mental activity is inexpressible because the perfection of perseverance is inexpressible.🔽One should know that mental activity is unattached because the perfection of perseverance is unattached.🔽One should know that mental activity is unfettered because the perfection of perseverance is unfettered.

original: yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba'i phyir /
translated: One should know that mental activity is unobscured because the perfection of perseverance is unobscured.🔽One should know that mental activity is not something that can be appropriated because the perfection of perseverance is not something that can be appropriated.🔽One should know that mental activity is non-existent because the perfection of perseverance is non-existent.🔽One should know that mental activity is unproduced because the perfection of perseverance is unproduced.

original: yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar rig par bya'o //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar rig par bya'o // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: One should know that mental activity is inexpressible because the perfection of perseverance is inexpressible.🔽One should know that mental activity is unattached because the perfection of perseverance is unattached.🔽One should know that mental activity is unfettered because the perfection of perseverance is unfettered.🔽One should know that mental activity is unobscured because the perfection of perseverance is unobscured.🔽One should know that mental activity is unarisen because the perfection of perseverance is unarisen.

original: yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o //🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i phyir /
translated: One should know that mental activity is unceasing because the perfection of perseverance is unceasing.🔽One should know that mental activity is pure because the perfection of perseverance is pure.🔽One should know that mental activity is emptiness because the perfection of perseverance is emptiness.🔽One should know that mental activity is isolated because the perfection of perseverance is isolated.

original: yid la byed pa dngos po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yid la byed pa dngos po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that mental activity is non-arising because the perfection of perseverance is non-ar

analyzed: pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir /

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things is due to the🔽isolation of non-things.

original: yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba'i phyir /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things should be known to be isolated because of the isolation of the mind that conceives of it.🔽The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things should be known to be non-arising because of the non-arising of the mind that conceives of it.🔽The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things should be known to be non-ceasing because of the non-ceasing of the mind that conceives of it.

original: yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar rig par bya'o //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar rig par bya'o // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things should be known to be purified of defilements because of the purification of the mind that conceives of it.🔽The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things should be known to be unproduced because of the unproduced nature of the mind that conceives of it.

original: yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o //🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dngos po med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dngos po med pa'i phyir /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things should be known to be unceasing because of the unceasing nature of the mind that conceives of it.🔽The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things should be known to be neither diminished nor increased because of the non-diminishing and non-increasing nature of the mind that conceives of it.🔽The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things should be known to be devoid of sentient beings because of the absence of sentient beings in the mind that conceives of it.

original: yid la byed pa dngos po med par rig par bya'o //🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rang bzhin med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yid la byed pa dngos po med par rig par bya'o // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rang bzhin med pa'i phyir /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things should be known to be devoid of a living being because of the absence of a living being in the mind that conceives of it.

original: yid la byed pa rang bzhin med par rig par bya'o //🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: yid la byed pa rang bzhin med par rig par bya'o // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things should be known to be devoid of a personal self because of the absence of a personal self in the mind that conceives of it.🔽The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things should be known to be devoid of a human being because of the absence of a human being in the mind that conceives of it.🔽The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things should be known to be devoid of a person because of the absence of a person in the mind that conceives of it.🔽The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things should be known to be devoid of an individual because of the absence of an individual in the mind that conceives of it.

original: yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things should be known to be devoid of a human being because of the absence of a human being in the mind that conceives of it.🔽The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things should be

analyzed: yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o //

original: @369b rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: @369b rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the knowledge of all aspects is signless,🔽you should know that mental activity is signless.🔽Because the knowledge of all aspects is wishless,🔽you should know that mental activity is wishless.🔽Because the knowledge of all aspects is without outflows,🔽you should know that mental activity is without outflows.🔽Because the knowledge of all aspects is unconditioned,

original: yid la byed pa dngos po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yid la byed pa dngos po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: you should know that mental activity is unconditioned.🔽Because the knowledge of all aspects is unarisen,🔽you should know that mental activity is unarisen.🔽Because the knowledge of all aspects is unceasing,🔽you should know that mental activity is unceasing.🔽Because the knowledge of all aspects is isolated,🔽you should know that mental activity is isolated.🔽Because the knowledge of all aspects is unattached,🔽you should know that mental activity is unattached.🔽Because the knowledge of all aspects is unbound,🔽you should know that mental activity is unbound.🔽Because the knowledge of all aspects is not a real existent,🔽you should know that mental activity is not a real existent.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rang bzhin med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rang bzhin med pa'i phyir /

analyzed: yid la byed pa rang bzhin med par rig par bya'o //
translated: you should know that mental activity is not a non-real existent.🔽Because the knowledge of all aspects is not pure,🔽you should know that mental activity is not pure.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because the knowledge of all aspects is not impure,🔽you should know that mental activity is not impure.🔽Because the knowledge of all aspects is not manifest,🔽you should know that mental activity is not manifest.🔽Because the knowledge of all aspects is not unmanifest,

original: yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: you should know that mental activity is not unmanifest.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir /

original: yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o //

translated: through this one of many explanations, one should know that the mental activity of the bodhisattva is not the same as the mental activity of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.🔽Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽through this one of many explanations, one should know that the mental activity of the bodhisattva is not the same as the mental activity of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

translated: All the gods of the pure abodes, together with many hundreds of thousands of millions of billions of gods, gathered in that assembly.🔽The light of the bodies of the gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm, which arises from the ripening of karma, the light of the bodies of the gods of the Trayas­triṃśa realm, which arises from the ripening of karma,

original: mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang /
translated: the light of the bodies of the gods of the Yāmā realm, which arises from the ripening of karma, the light of the bodies of the gods of the Tuṣita realm, which arises from the ripening of karma, the light of the bodies of the gods of the Nirmāṇa­rata realm, which arises from the ripening of karma,

original: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang /
translated: The light of the body that arises from the ripening of the karma of the gods of the Heaven of Making Use of Others’ Radiance, the light of the body that arises from the ripening of the karma of the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, the light of the body that arises from the ripening of the karma of the gods of the Heaven Free from Strife, the light of the body that arises from the ripening of the karma of the gods of the Heaven of Joy, the light of the body that arises from the ripening of the karma of the gods of the Luminous Heaven, the light of the body that arises from the ripening of the karma of the gods of the Heaven of the Masters of Others’ Emanations, the light of the body that arises from the ripening of the karma of the gods of the Heaven of Brahmā, and the light of the body that arises from the ripening of the karma of the gods of the Heaven of Radiant Wholesomeness.

original: @373b dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar ma song /🔽stong gi char yang nye bar ma song /
analyzed: @373b dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar ma song / stong gi char yang nye bar ma song /
translated: The light of the bodies of the gods of the Heaven of Increased Virtue, the light of the bodies of the gods of the Heaven of the Excellent Attributes, and the light of the bodies of the gods of the Heaven of Great Reward, and the light of the bodies of the gods of the Pure Abodes, do not approach even a hundredth of the light of the Tathāgata’s nature.🔽They do not approach even a thousandth.

original: brgya stong gi char yang nye bar ma song /🔽bye ba khrag khrig brgya'i char yang nye bar ma song /
analyzed: brgya stong gi char yang nye bar ma song / bye ba khrag khrig brgya'i char yang nye bar ma song /
translated: They do not approach even a hundred thousandth.🔽They do not approach even a hundred trillionth.

original: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar ma song ste /
analyzed: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar ma song ste /
translated: They do not approach even a hundred quintillionth.

original: grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang mi bzod de /
analyzed: grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang mi bzod de /
translated: They are not even a fraction, a number, a calculation, or an example.

analyzed: lhang nge ma yin gyi /

original: lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa'i de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtan la dbab par bstan pa thos par 'dod nas /
analyzed: lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa'i de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtan la dbab par bstan pa thos par 'dod nas /
translated: the gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm, the Trāyastriṃśa gods, the Yāma gods, the Tuṣita gods, the Nirmāṇa­rata gods, the Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin gods, the Brahmakāyika gods, the Ābhāsvara gods, the Śubhakṛtsna gods, and the gods of the Śuddhāvāsa realm, all of them wishing to hear the teaching of the definitive conclusion of the perfection of wisdom,

original: chos nyan pa'i phyir lhags na /
analyzed: chos nyan pa'i phyir lhags na /
translated: have come to listen to the Dharma.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings,

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya /
translated: how should they stand in the perfection of wisdom?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin /
translated: What is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar bslab par bya /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar bslab par bya /
translated: How should a bodhisattva great being train in the perfection of wisdom?

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: When this had been said, the venerable Subhūti

original: lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: said this to Śatakratu, head of the gods:

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la gyis shig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis /
analyzed: de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la gyis shig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis /
translated: therefore listen well and hard and pay attention, and I will tell you, through the power of the Buddha and through the Buddha’s blessing,🔽how bodhisattva great beings should stand in the perfection of wisdom, how bodhisattva great beings should train in the perfection of wisdom,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar bslab par bya ba dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar bslab par bya ba dang /
translated: and how bodhisattva great beings should practice the perfection of wisdom.”

original: lha'i bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag gis kyang /
analyzed: lha'i bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag gis kyang /
translated: Those gods who had not yet produced the thought of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ba bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ba bstan par bya'o //
translated: I will teach the generation of the thought of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: gang yang @374b dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni /
analyzed: gang yang @374b dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni /
translated: Those who have entered into the faultless

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mthu med de /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mthu med de /
translated: do not have the power to generate the thought of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi sa mtshams bcad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi sa mtshams bcad pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because they have cut off the continuity of saṃsāra.

original: 'on kyang gal te de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na de dag la'ang rjes su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: 'on kyang gal te de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na de dag la'ang rjes su yi rang ngo //
translated: But if they were to generate the thought of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, I would rejoice in that.

original: khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams 'thob par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams 'thob par 'gyur bas /
translated: They will attain qualities that are superior to the superior qualities.

original: de dag gi dge ba'i phyogs la bdag ni bar chad mi byed do //
analyzed: de dag gi dge ba'i phyogs la bdag ni bar chad mi byed do //
translated: I will not create an obstacle to their virtuous side.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika!

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na /🔽koo shi ka /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na / koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika, what is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings?

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
translated: Kauśika, here bodhisattva great beings,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas /

original: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis /
analyzed: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis /
translated: without apprehending anything,

original: gzugs ni mi rtag par yid la bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni mi rtag par yid la bya'o //

analyzed: 'du shes ni sdug bsngal bar yid la bya'o //

original: 'du shes ni dben par yid la bya'o //
analyzed: 'du shes ni dben par yid la bya'o //

original: 'du shes ni nad du yid la bya'o //🔽'du shes ni shu bar yid la bya'o //

translated: One should attend to perception as a disease.🔽One should attend to perception as a boil.

translated: He should attend to volitions as an enemy,🔽He should attend to volitions as impermanent,🔽He should attend to volitions as painful,

original: 'du byed na mi brtan par yid la bya'o //🔽'du byed ni @376a *//
analyzed: 'du byed na mi brtan par yid la bya'o // 'du byed ni @376a *//
translated: He should attend to volitions as empty,🔽He should attend to volitions as without a self,🔽He should attend to volitions as having no core,🔽He should attend to volitions as arising,

original: 'jig par yid la bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig par yid la bya'o //
translated: He should attend to volitions as ceasing,

original: 'du byed ni 'jigs par yid la bya'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ni 'jigs par yid la bya'o //
translated: one should contemplate conditioning as terrifying.

original: 'du byed ni 'go ba'i nad du yid la bya'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ni 'go ba'i nad du yid la bya'o //
translated: one should contemplate conditioning as a disaster.

original: 'du byed ni stong pa nyid du yid la bya'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ni stong pa nyid du yid la bya'o //
translated: one should contemplate conditioning as empty.

original: 'du byed ni bdag gi med par yid la bya'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ni bdag gi med par yid la bya'o //
translated: one should contemplate conditioning as not self.

original: 'du byed ni yid brtan du mi rung bar yid la bya'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ni yid brtan du mi rung bar yid la bya'o //
translated: one should contemplate conditioning as unreliable.

original: 'du byed ni gnod par yid la bya'o //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas /
analyzed: 'du byed ni gnod par yid la bya'o // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas /
translated: one should contemplate conditioning as a plague.🔽with the thought “I will live by the holy life with few wishes,”

original: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis /
analyzed: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis /
translated: without apprehending anything,

original: rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag par yid la bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag par yid la bya'o //
translated: one should contemplate consciousness as impermanent,

original: rnam par shes pa ni sdug bsngal bar yid la bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni sdug bsngal bar yid la bya'o //
translated: one should contemplate consciousness as painful,

original: rnam par shes pa ni bdag med par yid la bya'o //🔽rnam par shes pa ni zhi bar yid la bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni bdag med par yid la bya'o // rnam par shes pa ni zhi bar yid la bya'o //
translated: one should contemplate consciousness as selfless,🔽one should contemplate consciousness as calm,

original: rnam par shes pa ni dben par yid la bya'o //🔽rnam par shes pa ni nad du yid la bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni dben par yid la bya'o // rnam par shes pa ni nad du yid la bya'o //
translated: one should contemplate consciousness as empty,🔽one should contemplate consciousness as a disease,

original: rnam par shes pa ni shu bar yid la bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni shu bar yid la bya'o //
translated: one should contemplate consciousness as a boil,

original: rnam par shes pa ni zug rngur yid la bya'o //🔽rnam par shes pa ni sdig par yid la bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni zug rngur yid la bya'o // rnam par shes pa ni sdig par yid la bya'o //
translated: One should contemplate consciousness as a thorn.🔽One should contemplate consciousness as a crime.

original: rnam par shes pa ni na bar yid la bya'o //🔽rnam par shes pa ni dgrar yid la bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni na bar yid la bya'o // rnam par shes pa ni dgrar yid la bya'o //
translated: One should contemplate consciousness as a sickness.🔽One should contemplate consciousness as an enemy.

original: rnam par shes pa ni 'jig pa'i chos can du yid la bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni 'jig pa'i chos can du yid la bya'o //
translated: One should contemplate consciousness as subject to destruction.
